description: Detects attackers attempting to disable Windows Defender using Powershell
false_positives: Minimal, for some older versions of dev tools, such as pycharm, developers were known to sometimes disable Windows Defender to improve performance, but this generally is not considered a good security practice.
name: Powershell Used To Disable Windows Defender AV Security Monitoring
query: ((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\-DisableBehaviorMonitoring\ $true* OR *\-DisableRuntimeMonitoring\ $true*)) OR (process.command_line:*sc* AND process.command_line:*stop* AND process.command_line:*WinDefend*) OR (process.command_line:*sc* AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*WinDefend* AND process.command_line:*start\=disabled*))
author: ok @securonix invrep-de
